series_1.header_text: Drive In-Car Cameras Are Not Available
series_1.body_body: Drive In-Car Cameras are available for all Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races.

series_2.header_text: Drive In-Car Cameras Are Not Available
series_2.body_body: Drive In-Car Cameras are available for all companion NASCAR Xfinity Series races.

series_3.header_text: Drive In-Car Cameras Are Not Available
series_3.body_body: Live In-Car Cameras are exclusive to Monster Energy NASCAR Cup and Xfinity Series races.

series_1.body_body: Live Race Broadcast Radio is available for all Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races. Live In-Car Audio is available for all Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races with a Premium Subscription.

series_2.body_body: Live Race Broadcast Radio is available for all NASCAR Xfinity Series races. Live In-Car Audio is available for select NASCAR Xfinity Series races with a Premium Subscription.

series_3.body_body: Live Race Broadcast Radio is available for all NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series races.

series_1.body_body: Crew Chief is available for all Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races.

series_2.body_body: Crew Chief is available for all companion NASCAR Xfinity Series races.

series_3.body_body: Crew Chief is not available for NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series races.

series_1.body_body: In-Race Highlights are offered to all users. Highlights are available Green Flag to Checkered Flag for all Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races.

series_2.body_body: In-Race Highlights are offered to all users. Highlights are available Green Flag to Checkered Flag for all NASCAR Xfinity Series races.

series_3.body_body: In-Race Highlights are offered to all users. Highlights are available Green Flag to Checkered Flag for all NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series races.
